description: Warm up with a big bowl of flavour-packed chilli con carne, with a twist. This delicious easy dinner idea is made even better with eggs, and is ready in 30 minutes.
keywords: Chilli,Roast,Seafood free,Bonus,Tree nut free,Egg,Healthier Easier,Beef,Quick & easy dinner,Mince,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chilli con carne with eggs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
420g can no added salt red kidney beans, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large flameproof roasting pan over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic, then cook, stirring, for 4 minutes or until onion has softened. Add chilli powder and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add mince and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in tomatoes, paste, beans and 1/4 cup water. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until mixture thickens. Season.

Using the back of a spoon, make four indents in mince mixture. Crack one egg into each indent, then cook, covered, for 2 minutes or until eggs are cooked to your liking. Scatter over coriander and serve with tortillas.
